author: Frank Wilk

review: I bought one of these at Best Buy, toss up between this and the Google product. I've had it for three months now and have yet to make it through ONE night of streaming, JUST ONE, without having any streaming issues. I constantly have to disconnect, reconnect to the internet to get this device to work. It's a complete JOKE. No, it's not my internet that's the problem, it's the device. I live in an apartment complex and have tried it on my internet and my neighbor's internet, took it to a friend's house and tried it on their internet. I very rarely experience any issues whatsoever trying to stream content on any of my other devices. I'm CONSTANTLY having issues with this device.PROS:Price pointCONS:Cannot make it through a single night without streaming issues. Product sucks.
author: C. Larsen

review: It is a nice stick. The downside is the power cord must be plugged in all the time. 10 stars would be given if it was wireless or had rechargeable batteries.
author: carlos

review: I received this for fee when I signed up to Sling. It came in very handy for the season finale of Game of Thrones when my Roku would not load the overloaded HBO website. The Fire Stick on HBO worked and the party I was hosting wasn't ruined. Although the Stick doesn't have all the benefits that a box has, it is more portable so best device while travelling.
